description:
Hinata goes up against Neji, but he hits her pressure point by using his Byakugan (white eyes). Hinata`s flow of chakra is stopped, and she almost loses consciousness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akogare no Hito no Me no Mae de!!
Combattere di fronte al proprio eroe
Sous les yeux de celui que j`admire
ต่อหน้าคนที่ใฝ่ฝันมานาน
